title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VI, pt. 621 - Uniform Procedures
content:

State Regulations

Introduction (§ 621.1 to 621.2)

Permit Application Procedures (§ 621.3 to 621.11)

Miscellaneous Procedures (§ 621.12 to 621.19)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VI, pt. 621

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 1-0101, 3-0301, 9- 0105, 9-1103, 15-0313, 15-0503-2[c], 15-0507.1, 17-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19- 0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 70-0107, 70-0707, 71-2103, 71-2105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
